newsitem.title: UK: UK underwrites loans for LNG development in Quatar.
newsitem.headline: UK underwrites loans for LNG development in Quatar.

text.p: Britain's Export Creditis Guarantee Department said on Friday that it was underwriting $45 million of loans as part of a financing package to develop a major liquefied natural gas export production facility in Qatar.

The loans will be used to reimburse Qatar-based borrowers for payments made to a substantial number of British contractors which have provided goods and servies for the upstream stage of the project to explot the Khuff offshore natrual gas reservoir.
